lead_paragraph: The hectic major golf season comes to a close with the PGA Championship at venerable Baltusrol Golf Club starting on Thursday, a classic course where accuracy with the driver could be the key to victory.

headline.print_headline: Driver May Be Key to Solving Baltusrol at PGA Championship
headline.main: Driver May Be Key to Solving Baltusrol at PGA Championship

snippet: The hectic major golf season comes to a close with the PGA Championship at venerable Baltusrol Golf Club starting on Thursday, a classic course where accuracy with the driver could be the key to victory....
